input.sentences: the belly dancer arrived for her first lesson of the day .
the photographer got good shots for the participants .
she showed them hand movements to go with the hips .
the gathered interest allowed for signups for the next session to happen .
output.sentences: She is rocking her two piece party outfit and loving it.
The "tourist" seems to be loving her attire and the whole crew as well!
Being surrounded by her friends makes this birthday lady the happiest.
Her cake really shows her funny and odd personality.
Everyone knows everyone here and being around each other is being home.
